mapper.select: select sb.store_idx ,sb.member_idx ,sb.store_name ,sb.is_accept ,sb.store_status ,sb.rejection_reason ,sb.processed_at ,sb.applied_at ,img.image_url as store_profile_path from store sb join image img on img.target_idx = sb.store_idx where sb.member_idx = #{member_idx} and img.target_type = 'imguse_01'
